tool_description:
Zip Code Galore!
Zip·po·pot·amus   /ˈzipōpätəməs/
Postal Codes and Zip Codes made easy

Free API with JSON Response Format

Over 60 Countries Supported

Perfect for Form Autocompletion

Open for Crowdsourcing and Contribution
name: Zippopotam.us
title: Zippopotam.us

api_list.name: Get Zip Code info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com/us/90210"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com/{country}/{postal_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get info by city
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com/us/ma/belmont"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com/{country}/{state}/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-zippopotamus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
